Content:: Daya Sepali Senadheera (?- 1988) was a Sri Lankan politician.[1][2] She was nominated by the United National Party, to fill the seat of Karandeniya, following the death of her husband, Bandulahewa in January 1982.[3] Officially taking office on 26 March 1982.[4] Senadheera was assassinated at her home in 1988 by the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) during the second JVP insurrection.[5][6][7]
Title: Daya Sepali Senadheera - Wikipedia
